title: sa_pāṇini-aṣṭādhyāyī
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>

<l>vṛddhir ād-aic || PS_1,1.1 ||</l>

<l>adeṅ guṇaḥ || PS_1,1.2 ||</l>

<l>iko guṇa-vṛddhī || PS_1,1.3 ||</l>

<l>na dhātu-lopa ārdhadhātuke || PS_1,1.4 ||</l>

<l>kṅiti ca || PS_1,1.5 ||</l>

<l>dīdhī-vevī-iṭām || PS_1,1.6 ||</l>

<l>halo 'nantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ || PS_1,1.7 ||</l>

<l>mukha-nāsikā-vacano 'nunāsikaḥ || PS_1,1.8 ||</l>

<l>tulya-āsya-prayarnaṃ savarṇam || PS_1,1.9 ||</l>

<l>na aj-jhalau || PS_1,1.10 ||</l>

<l>īd-ūd-ed-dvivacanaṃ pragṛhyam || PS_1,1.11 ||</l>

<l>adaso māt || PS_1,1.12 ||</l>

<l>śe || PS_1,1.13 ||</l>

<l>nipāta eka-aj-an-āṅ || PS_1,1.14 ||</l>

<l>ot || PS_1,1.15 ||</l>

<l>sambuddhau śākalyasya-itāv anārṣe || PS_1,1.16 ||</l>

<l>uñaḥ || PS_1,1.17 ||</l>

<l>ūṃ || PS_1,1.18 ||</l>

<l>īd-ūtau ca saptamy-arthe || PS_1,1.19 ||</l>

<l>dā-dhā ghv-adāp || PS_1,1.20 ||</l>

<l>ādyantavad ekasmin || PS_1,1.21 ||</l>

<l>tarap-tamapau ghaḥ || PS_1,1.22 ||</l>

<l>bahu-gaṇa-vatu-ḍati saṅkhyā || PS_1,1.23 ||</l>

<l>ṣṇa-antā ṣaṭ || PS_1,1.24 ||</l>

<l>ḍati ca || PS_1,1.25 ||</l>

<l>kta-ktavatū niṣṭhā || PS_1,1.26 ||</l>

<l>sarva-ādīni sarvanāmāni || PS_1,1.27 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā dikṣamāse bahuvrīhau || PS_1,1.28 ||</l>

<l>na bahuvrīhau || PS_1,1.29 ||</l>

<l>tṛtīyā-samāse || PS_1,1.30 ||</l>

<l>dvandve ca || PS_1,1.31 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā jasi || PS_1,1.32 ||</l>

<l>prathama-carama-taya-alpa-ardha-katipaya-nemāś ca || PS_1,1.33 ||</l>

<l>pūrva-para-avaradakṣiṇa-uttara-apara-adharāṇi vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām || PS_1,1.34 ||</l>

<l>svam ajñāti-dhana-ākhyāyām || PS_1,1.35 ||</l>

<l>antaraṃ bahiryoga-upasaṃvyānayoḥ || PS_1,1.36 ||</l>

<l>svarādi-nipātam avyayam || PS_1,1.37 ||</l>

<l>taddhitaś ca asarva-vibhaktiḥ || PS_1,1.38 ||</l>

<l>kṛn-m-ej-antaḥ || PS_1,1.39 ||</l>

<l>ktvā-tosun-kasunaḥ || PS_1,1.40 ||</l>

<l>avyayī-bhāvaś ca || PS_1,1.41 ||</l>

<l>śi sarvanāma-sthānam || PS_1,1.42 ||</l>

<l>suḍ anapuṃsakasya || PS_1,1.43 ||</l>

<l>na vā-iti vibhāṣā || PS_1,1.44 ||</l>

<l>ig-yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam || PS_1,1.45 ||</l>

<l>gāṅ-kuṭādibhyo 'ñṇinṅit || PS_1,2.1 ||</l>

<l>vija iṭ || PS_1,2.2 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā-ūrṇoḥ || PS_1,2.3 ||</l>

<l>sārvadhātukam apit || PS_1,2.4 ||</l>

<l>asaṃyogāl liṭ kit || PS_1,2.5 ||</l>

<l>indhi-bhavatibhyāṃ ca || PS_1,2.6 ||</l>

<l>mṛḍ-amṛda-gudha-kuṣa-kliśa-vada-vasaḥ ktvā || PS_1,2.7 ||</l>

<l>ruda-vida-muṣa-grahi-svapi-pracchaḥ saṃś ca || PS_1,2.8 ||</l>

<l>iko jhal || PS_1,2.9 ||</l>

<l>halantāc ca || PS_1,2.10 ||</l>

<l>liṅ-sicau ātmanepadeṣu || PS_1,2.11 ||</l>

<l>uś ca || PS_1,2.12 ||</l>

<l>vā gamaḥ || PS_1,2.13 ||</l>

<l>hanaḥ sic || PS_1,2.14 ||</l>

<l>yamo gandhane || PS_1,2.15 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā-upayamane || PS_1,2.16 ||</l>

<l>sthāghvor icca || PS_1,2.17 ||</l>

<l>na ktvā sa-iṭ || PS_1,2.18 ||</l>

<l>niṣṭhā śīṅ-svidi-midi-kṣvidi-dhṛṣaḥ || PS_1,2.19 ||</l>

<l>mṛṣas titikṣāyām || PS_1,2.20 ||</l>

<l>udupadhād bhāva-ādikarmaṇor anyatarasyām || PS_1,2.21 ||</l>

<l>pūṅaḥ ktvā ca || PS_1,2.22 ||</l>

<l>na-upadhāt tha-pha-antād vā || PS_1,2.23 ||</l>

<l>vañci-luñcy-ṛtaś ca || PS_1,2.24 ||</l>

<l>tṛṣi-mṛṣi-kṛśeḥ kāśyapasya || PS_1,2.25 ||</l>

<l>ralo v-y-upadhad-dhal-ādeḥ saṃś ca || PS_1,2.26 ||</l>

<l>ūkālo 'j-jhrasva-dīrgha-plutaḥ || PS_1,2.27 ||</l>

<l>acaś ca || PS_1,2.28 ||</l>

<l>uccair udāttaḥ || PS_1,2.29 ||</l>

<l>nīcair anudāttaḥ || PS_1,2.30 ||</l>

<l>samāhāraḥ svaritaḥ || PS_1,2.31 ||</l>

<l>tasya-ādita udāttam ardha-hrasvam || PS_1,2.32 ||</l>

<l>eka-śruti dūrāt sambuddhau || PS_1,2.33 ||</l>

<l>yajña-karmaṇy-ajapa-nyūṅkha-sāmasu || PS_1,2.34 ||</l>

<l>uccaistarāṃ vā vaṣaṭkāraḥ || PS_1,2.35 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā chandasi || PS_1,2.36 ||</l>

<l>na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ || PS_1,2.37 ||</l>

<l>deva-brahmaṇor anudāttaḥ || PS_1,2.38 ||</l>

<l>svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām || PS_1,2.39 ||</l>

<l>udātta-svarita-parasya sannataraḥ || PS_1,2.40 ||</l>

<l>apṛkta eka-al pratyayaḥ || PS_1,2.41 ||</l>

<l>tatpuruṣaḥ samāna-adhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ || PS_1,2.42 ||</l>

<l>prathamā-nirdiṣṭaṃ samāsa upasarjanam || PS_1,2.43 ||</l>

<l>eka-vibhākti ca apūrva-nipāte || PS_1,2.44 ||</l>

<l>arthavad adhātur apratyayaḥ prātipadikam || PS_1,2.45 ||</l>

<l>kṛt-taddhita-samāsāś ca || PS_1,2.46 ||</l>

<l>hrasvo napuṃsake prātipadikasya || PS_1,2.47 ||</l>

<l>gostriyor upasarjanasya || PS_1,2.48 ||</l>

<l>luk taddhita-luki || PS_1,2.49 ||</l>

<l>id-goṇyāḥ || PS_1,2.50 ||</l>

<l>lupi yuktavad-vyaktivacane || PS_1,2.51 ||</l>

<l>viśeṣaṇānāṃ ca ajāteḥ || PS_1,2.52 ||</l>

<l>tad aśiṣyaṃ sañjñā-pramāṇatvāt || PS_1,2.53 ||</l>

<l>lub yoga-aprakhyānāt || PS_1,2.54 ||</l>

<l>yoga-pramāṇe ca tad-abhāve 'darśanam syāt || PS_1,2.55 ||</l>

<l>pradhāna-pratyaya-arthavacanam arthasya anya-pramāṇātvāt || PS_1,2.56 ||</l>

<l>kāla-upasarjane ca tulyam || PS_1,2.57 ||</l>

<l>jāty-ākhyāyam ekasmin bahuvacanam anyatarasyām || PS_1,2.58 ||</l>

<l>asmado dvayoś ca || PS_1,2.59 ||</l>

<l>phalgunī-proṣṭhapadānāṃ ca nakṣatre || PS_1,2.60 ||</l>

<l>chandasi punarvasvorekavacanam || PS_1,2.61 ||</l>

<l>viśākhayoś ca || PS_1,2.62 ||</l>

<l>tiṣya-punarvasvor nakṣatra-dvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanaṃ nityam || PS_1,2.63 ||</l>

<l>sasūpāṇām ekaśeṣa eka-vibhaktau || PS_1,2.64 ||</l>

<l>vṛddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ || PS_1,2.65 ||</l>

<l> strī puṃvac-ca || PS_1,2.66 ||</l>

<l>pumān striyā || PS_1,2.67 ||</l>

<l>bhrātṛ-putrau svasṛ-duhitṛbhyām || PS_1,2.68 ||</l>

<l>napuṃsakam anapuṃsakena-ekavac-ca-asya-anyatarasyām || PS_1,2.69 ||</l>

<l>pitā mātrā || PS_1,2.70 ||</l>

<l>śvaśuraḥ śvasravā || PS_1,2.71 ||</l>

<l>tyad-ādīni sarvair nityam || PS_1,2.72 ||</l>

<l>grāmya-paśu-saṅgheṣv ataruṇeśu strī || PS_1,2.73 ||</l>

<l>bhūvādayo dhātavaḥ || PS_1,3.1 ||</l>

<l>upadeśe 'j-anunāsika it || PS_1,3.2 ||</l>

<l>hal-antyam || PS_1,3.3 ||</l>

<l>na vibhaktau tusmāḥ || PS_1,3.4 ||</l>

<l>ādir ñi-ṭu-ḍavaḥ || PS_1,3.5 ||</l>

<l>ṣaḥ pratyayasaya || PS_1,3.6 ||</l>

<l>duṭū || PS_1,3.7 ||</l>

<l>la-śa-kv ataddhite || PS_1,3.8 ||</l>

<l>tasya lopaḥ || PS_1,3.9 ||</l>

<l>yathā-saṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām || PS_1,3.10 ||</l>

<l>svaritena adhikāraḥ || PS_1,3.11 ||</l>

<l>anudāttaṅita ātmanepadam || PS_1,3.12 ||</l>

<l>bhāva-karmaṇoḥ || PS_1,3.13 ||</l>

<l>kartari karma-vyatihāre || PS_1,3.14 ||</l>

<l>na gati-hiṃsā-arthebhyaḥ || PS_1,3.15 ||</l>

<l>itaretara-anyonya-upapadāc ca || PS_1,3.16 ||</l>

<l>ner viśaḥ || PS_1,3.17 ||</l>

<l>parivy-avebhyaḥ kriyaḥ || PS_1,3.18 ||</l>

<l>viparābhyāṃ jeḥ || PS_1,3.19 ||</l>

<l>aṅo do 'nāsya-viharaṇe || PS_1,3.20 ||</l>

<l>krīḍo 'nu-saṃ-paribhyaś ca || PS_1,3.21 ||</l>

<l>samavapravibhyaḥ sthaḥ || PS_1,3.22 ||</l>

<l>prakāśana-stheya-ākhyahoś ca || PS_1,3.23 ||</l>

<l>udo 'nūrdhva-karmaṇi || PS_1,3.24 ||</l>

<l>upān mantra-karaṇe || PS_1,3.25 ||</l>

<l>akarmakāc ca || PS_1,3.26 ||</l>

<l>ud-vibhyāṃ tapaḥ || PS_1,3.27 ||</l>

<l>āṅo yama-hanaḥ || PS_1,3.28 ||</l>

<l>samo gamy-ṛcchi-pracchi-svaraty arti-śru-vidighyaḥ || PS_1,3.29 ||</l>

<l>ni-sam-upa-vibhyo hvaḥ || PS_1,3.30 ||</l>

<l>spardhāyām āṅaḥ || PS_1,3.31 ||</l>

<l>gandhana-avakṣepaṇa-sevana-sāhasikya-pratithatna-prakathana-upayogeṣu kṛñaḥ || PS_1,3.32 ||</l>

<l>adheḥ prasahane || PS_1,3.33 ||</l>

<l>veḥ śabda-karmaṇaḥ || PS_1,3.34 ||</l>

<l>akarmakāc ca || PS_1,3.35 ||</l>

<l>sammānana-utsañjana-ācāryakaraṇa-jñāna-bhṛti-vigaṇana-vyayeṣu niyaḥ || PS_1,3.36 ||</l>

<l>kartṛsthe ca śarīre karmaṇi || PS_1,3.37 ||</l>

<l>vṛtti-sarga-tāyaneṣu kramaḥ || PS_1,3.38 ||</l>

<l>upa-parābhyām || PS_1,3.39 ||</l>

<l>āṅa udgamane || PS_1,3.40 ||</l>

<l>veḥ pāda-viharaṇe || PS_1,3.41 ||</l>

<l>pra-upābhyāṃ samarthābhyām || PS_1,3.42 ||</l>

<l>anupasargād vā || PS_1,3.43 ||</l>

<l>apahnave jñaḥ || PS_1,3.44 ||</l>

<l>akarmakāc ca || PS_1,3.45 ||</l>

<l>saṃ-pratibhyām anādhyāne || PS_1,3.46 ||</l>

<l>bhāsana-upasambhāṣā-jñāna-yatna-vimaty-upamantraṇeṣu vadaḥ || PS_1,3.47 ||</l>

<l>vyaktavācāṃ samuccāraṇe || PS_1,3.48 ||</l>

<l>anor akarmakāt || PS_1,3.49 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā vipralāpe || PS_1,3.50 ||</l>

<l>avād graḥ || PS_1,3.51 ||</l>

<l>samaḥ pratijñāne || PS_1,3.52 ||</l>

<l>udaś caraḥ sakarmakāt || PS_1,3.53 ||</l>

<l>saṃs tṛtīyā-yuktāt || PS_1,3.54 ||</l>

<l>dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe || PS_1,3.55 ||</l>

<l>upād yamaḥ svakarane || PS_1,3.56 ||</l>

<l>jñā-śru-smṛ-dṛśāṃ sanaḥ || PS_1,3.57 ||</l>

<l>na anor jñaḥ || PS_1,3.58 ||</l>

<l>praty-āṅbhyāṃ śruvaḥ || PS_1,3.59 ||</l>

<l>śadeḥ śitaḥ || PS_1,3.60 ||</l>

<l>mriyater luṅ-liṅoś ca || PS_1,3.61 ||</l>

<l>pūrvavat sanaḥ || PS_1,3.62 ||</l>

<l>ām-pratyayavat kṛño 'nuprayogasya || PS_1,3.63 ||</l>

<l>pra-upābhyāṃ yujer ayajña-pātreṣu || PS_1,3.64 ||</l>

<l>samaḥ kṣṇuvaḥ || PS_1,3.65 ||</l>

<l>bhujo 'navane || PS_1,3.66 ||</l>

<l>ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne || PS_1,3.67 ||</l>

<l>bhī-smyor hetubhaye || PS_1,3.68 ||</l>

<l>gṛdhi-vañcyoḥ pralambhane || PS_1,3.69 ||</l>

<l>liyaḥ saṃmānana-śālīnīkaraṇayoś ca || PS_1,3.70 ||</l>

<l>mithyopapadāt kṛño 'bhyāse || PS_1,3.71 ||</l>

<l>svarita-ñitaḥ kartr-abhiprāye kriyāphale || PS_1,3.72 ||</l>

<l>apād vadaḥ || PS_1,3.73 ||</l>

<l>ṇicaś ca || PS_1,3.74 ||</l>

<l>sam-ud-āṅbhyo yamo 'granthe || PS_1,3.75 ||</l>

<l>anupasargāj jñaḥ || PS_1,3.76 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā-upapadena pratīyamāne || PS_1,3.77 ||</l>

<l>śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam || PS_1,3.78 ||</l>

<l>anu-parābhyāṃ kṛñaḥ || PS_1,3.79 ||</l>

<l>abhi-praty-atibhyaḥ kṣipaḥ || PS_1,3.80 ||</l>

<l>prādvahaḥ || PS_1,3.81 ||</l>

<l>parer mṛṣaḥ || PS_1,3.82 ||</l>

<l>vy-āṅ-paribhyo ramaḥ || PS_1,3.83 ||</l>

<l>upāc ca || PS_1,3.84 ||</l>

<l>vibhāśā 'karmakāt || PS_1,3.85 ||</l>

<l>budha-yudha-naśa-jana-iṅ-pru-dru-srubhyo ṇeḥ || PS_1,3.86 ||</l>

<l>nigaraṇa-calana-arthebhyaś ca || PS_1,3.87 ||</l>

<l>aṇāv akarmakāc cittavat-kartṛkāt || PS_1,3.88 ||</l>

<l>na pādamy-āṅyama-āṅyasa-parimuha-ruci-nṛti-vada-vasaḥ || PS_1,3.89 ||</l>

<l>vā kyaṣaḥ || PS_1,3.90 ||</l>

<l>dhydbhyo luṅi || PS_1,3.91 ||</l>

<l>vṛdbhyaḥ syasanoḥ || PS_1,3.92 ||</l>

<l>luṭi ca klupaḥ || PS_1,3.93 ||</l>

<l>ā kaḍārādekā sañjñā || PS_1,4.1 ||</l>

<l>vipratiṣedhe paraṃ kāryam || PS_1,4.2 ||</l>

<l>yū stry-ākhyau nadī || PS_1,4.3 ||</l>

<l>na-iyaṅ-uvaṅ-sthānāv astrī || PS_1,4.4 ||</l>

<l>va+āmi || PS_1,4.5 ||</l>

<l>ṅiti hrasvaś ca || PS_1,4.6 ||</l>

<l>śeṣo ghyasakhi || PS_1,4.7 ||</l>

<l>patiḥ samāsa eva || PS_1,4.8 ||</l>

<l>ṣaṣṭhī-yuktaś chandasi vā || PS_1,4.9 ||</l>

<l>hrasvaṃ laghu || PS_1,4.10 ||</l>

<l>saṃyoge guru || PS_1,4.11 ||</l>

<l>dīrghaṃ ca || PS_1,4.12 ||</l>

<l>yasmāt pratyaya-vidhis tad-ādi pratyaye 'ṅgam || PS_1,4.13 ||</l>

<l>sup-tiṅ-antaṃ padam || PS_1,4.14 ||</l>

<l>naḥ kye || PS_1,4.15 ||</l>

<l>siti ca || PS_1,4.16 ||</l>

<l>svādiṣv a-sarvanamasthāne || PS_1,4.17 ||</l>

<l>yaci bham || PS_1,4.18 ||</l>

<l>tasau matv-arthe || PS_1,4.19 ||</l>

<l>ayasmaya-ādīni chandasi || PS_1,4.20 ||</l>

<l>bahuṣu bahuvacanam || PS_1,4.21 ||</l>

<l>dvy-ekayor dvibacanaa-ekavacane || PS_1,4.22 ||</l>

<l>kārake || PS_1,4.23 ||</l>

<l>dhruvamapāye 'pādānam || PS_1,4.24 ||</l>

<l>bhī-trā-arthānāṃ bhaya-hetuḥ || PS_1,4.25 ||</l>

<l>parā-jer asoḍhaḥ || PS_1,4.26 ||</l>

<l>vāraṇa-arthānām īpsitaḥ || PS_1,4.27 ||</l>

<l>antardhau yena adarśanam icchati || PS_1,4.28 ||</l>

<l>ākhyātā-upayoge || PS_1,4.29 ||</l>

<l>jani-kartuḥ prakṛtiḥ || PS_1,4.30 ||</l>

<l>bhuvaḥ prabhavaḥ || PS_1,4.31 ||</l>

<l>karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam || PS_1,4.32 ||</l>

<l>rucy-arthānām prīyamāṇaḥ || PS_1,4.33 ||</l>

<l>ślāgha-hnuṅ-sthā-śapāṃ jñīpsyamānaḥ || PS_1,4.34 ||</l>

<l>dhārer uttamarṇaḥ || PS_1,4.35 ||</l>

<l>spṛher īpsitaḥ || PS_1,4.36 ||</l>

<l>krudha-druha-īrṣya-asūya-arthānāṃ yaṃ prati kopaḥ || PS_1,4.37 ||</l>

<l>krudha-druhor upasṛṣṭhayoḥ karma || PS_1,4.38 ||</l>

<l>rādḥ-īkṣyor yasya vipraśnaḥ || PS_1,4.39 ||</l>

<l>praty-āṅbhyāṃ śruvaḥ pūrvasya kartā || PS_1,4.40 ||</l>

<l>anu-prati-gṛṇaś ca || PS_1,4.41 ||</l>

<l>sādhakatamaṃ karaṇam || PS_1,4.42 ||</l>

<l>divaḥ karma ca || PS_1,4.43 ||</l>

<l>parikrayaṇe sampradānam anyatarasyām || PS_1,4.44 ||</l>

<l>ādhāro 'dhikaraṇam || PS_1,4.45 ||</l>

<l>adhi-śīṅ-sthā-āsāṃ karma || PS_1,4.46 ||</l>

<l>abhiniviśaś ca || PS_1,4.47 ||</l>

<l>upa-anv-adhy-āṅ-vasaḥ || PS_1,4.48 ||</l>

<l>kartrur īpsitatamaṃ karma || PS_1,4.49 ||</l>

<l>tathā-yuktaṃ ca anīpsitam || PS_1,4.50 ||</l>

<l>tadvahati rathayugaprāsaṅgam || PS_4,4.76 ||</l>

<l>dhuro yaḍ-ḍhakau || PS_4,4.77 ||</l>

<l>khaḥ sarvadhurāt || PS_4,4.78 ||</l>

<l>ekadhurāl luk ca || PS_4,4.79 ||</l>

<l>śakaṭād aṇ || PS_4,4.80 ||</l>

<l>halasīrāṭ ṭhak || PS_4,4.81 ||</l>

<l>sañjñāyāṃ janyāḥ || PS_4,4.82 ||</l>

<l>annāṇ ṇaḥ || PS_4,4.85 ||</l>

<l>vaśaṃ gataḥ || PS_4,4.86 ||</l>

<l>padam asmin dṛśyam || PS_4,4.87 ||</l>

<l>mūlam asya āvarhi || PS_4,4.88 ||</l>

<l>sañjñāyāṃ dhenuṣyā || PS_4,4.89 ||</l>

<l>gṛhapatinā saṃyukte ñyaḥ || PS_4,4.90 ||</l>

<l>nau-vayo-dharma-viṣa-mūla-mūla-sītā-tulābhyas tārya-tulya-prāpya-vadhya-ānāmya-sama-samita-saṃmiteṣu || PS_4,4.91 ||</l>

<l>dharma-pathy-artha-nyāyād anapete || PS_4,4.92 ||</l>

<l>chandaso nirmite || PS_4,4.93 ||</l>

<l>hṛdayasya priyaḥ || PS_4,4.95 ||</l>

<l>bandhane carṣau || PS_4,4.96 ||</l>

<l>matajanahalāt karaṇajalpakarṣeṣu || PS_4,4.97 ||</l>

<l>tatra sādhuḥ || PS_4,4.98 ||</l>

<l>pratijana-ādibhyaḥ khañ || PS_4,4.99 ||</l>

<l>bhaktāṇ ṇaḥ || PS_4,4.100 ||</l>

<l>pariṣado ṇyaḥ || PS_4,4.101 ||</l>

<l>kathādibhyaṣ ṭhak || PS_4,4.102 ||</l>

<l>guḍa-ādibhyaṣ ṭhañ || PS_4,4.103 ||</l>

<l>pathy-atithi-vasati-svapater ḍhañ || PS_4,4.104 ||</l>

<l>sabhāyāḥ yaḥ || PS_4,4.105 ||</l>

<l>samānātīrthe vāsī || PS_4,4.107 ||</l>

<l>samāna-udare śayita o codāttaḥ || PS_4,4.108 ||</l>

<l>sodarād yaḥ || PS_4,4.109 ||</l>

<l>bhave chandasi || PS_4,4.110 ||</l>

<l>pātho-nadībhyāṃ ḍyaṇ || PS_4,4.111 ||</l>

<l>veśanta-himavadbhyām aṇ || PS_4,4.112 ||</l>

<l>srotaso vibhāṣā ḍyaḍ-ḍyau || PS_4,4.113 ||</l>

<l>sagarbha-sayūtha-sanutād yan || PS_4,4.114 ||</l>

<l>tugrād ghan || PS_4,4.115 ||</l>

<l>agrād yat || PS_4,4.116 ||</l>

<l>gha-cchau ca || PS_4,4.117 ||</l>

<l>samudra-abhrād ghaḥ || PS_4,4.118 ||</l>

<l>barhiṣi dattam || PS_4,4.119 ||</l>

<l>dutasya bhāga-karmaṇī || PS_4,4.120 ||</l>

<l>rakṣo-yātūnāṃ hananī || PS_4,4.121 ||</l>

<l>revatī-jagatī-haviṣyābhyaḥ praśasye || PS_4,4.122 ||</l>

<l>asurasya svam || PS_4,4.123 ||</l>

<l>māyāyām aṇ || PS_4,4.124 ||</l>

<l>tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ || PS_4,4.125 ||</l>

<l>aśvimānaṇ || PS_4,4.126 ||</l>

<l>vayasyāsu mūrdhno matup || PS_4,4.127 ||</l>

<l> matv-arhe māsa-tanvoḥ || PS_4,4.128 ||</l>

<l>madhor ña ca || PS_4,4.129 ||</l>

<l>ojaso 'hani yatkhau || PS_4,4.130 ||</l>

<l>veśo-yaśa-āder bhagād yal || PS_4,4.131 ||</l>

<l>kha ca || PS_4,4.132 ||</l>

<l>pūrvaiḥ kṛtam ina-yau ca || PS_4,4.133 ||</l>

<l>adbhiḥ saṃskṛtam || PS_4,4.134 ||</l>

<l>sahasreṇa saṃmitau ghaḥ || PS_4,4.135 ||</l>

<l>matau ca || PS_4,4.136 ||</l>

<l>somam arhati yaḥ || PS_4,4.137 ||</l>

<l>maye ca || PS_4,4.138 ||</l>

<l>madhoḥ || PS_4,4.139 ||</l>

<l>vasoḥ samūhe ca || PS_4,4.140 ||</l>

<l>nakṣatrād ghaḥ || PS_4,4.141 ||</l>

<l>sarvadevāt tātil || PS_4,4.142 ||</l>

<l>śiva-śam-ariṣṭasya kare || PS_4,4.143 ||</l>

<l>bhāve ca || PS_4,4.144 ||</l>

<l>prāk-krītāc chaḥ || PS_5,1.1 ||</l>

<l>u-gavādibhyo yat || PS_5,1.2 ||</l>

<l>kaṃvalāc ca sañjñāyām || PS_5,1.3 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā havir-apūpa-ādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.4 ||</l>

<l>tasmai hitam || PS_5,1.5 ||</l>

<l>śarīra-avayavād yat || PS_5,1.6 ||</l>

<l>khala-yava-māṣa-tila-vṛṣa-brahmaṇaś ca || PS_5,1.7 ||</l>

<l>ajāvibhyāṃ thyan || PS_5,1.8 ||</l>

<l>ātman-viśvajana-bhoga-uttarapadāt khaḥ || PS_5,1.9 ||</l>

<l>sarva-puruṣābhyāṃ ṇa-ḍhañau || PS_5,1.10 ||</l>

<l>māṇava-carakābhyāṃ khañ || PS_5,1.11 ||</l>

<l>tad-arthaṃ vikṛteḥ prakṛtau || PS_5,1.12 ||</l>

<l>chadir-upadhi-baler ḍhañ || PS_5,1.13 ||</l>

<l>ṛṣabha-upānahor ñyaḥ || PS_5,1.14 ||</l>

<l>carmaṇo 'ñ || PS_5,1.15 ||</l>

<l>tad asya tad asmin syād iti || PS_5,1.16 ||</l>

<l>parikhāyā ṭhañ || PS_5,1.17 ||</l>

<l>prāg-vateṣ ṭhañ || PS_5,1.18 ||</l>

<l>ā-arhād a-gopuccha-saṅkhyā-parimāṇāṭ ṭhak || PS_5,1.19 ||</l>

<l>asamāse niṣka-ādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.20 ||</l>

<l>śatāc ca ṭhanyatāv aśate || PS_5,1.21 ||</l>

<l>saṅkhyāyā ati-śad-antāyāḥ kan || PS_5,1.22 ||</l>

<l>vator iḍ vā || PS_5,1.23 ||</l>

<l>viṃśati-triṃśadbhyāṃ ḍvun asañjñāyām || PS_5,1.24 ||</l>

<l>kaṃsāṭ ṭiṭhaṇ || PS_5,1.25 ||</l>

<l>śūrpād añ anyatarasyām || PS_5,1.26 ||</l>

<l>śatamāna-viṃśatika-sahasra-vasanād aṇ || PS_5,1.27 ||</l>

<l>adhyardhapūrva-dvigor lug asañjñāyām || PS_5,1.28 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā kārṣāpaṇa-sahasrābhyām || PS_5,1.29 ||</l>

<l>dvi-tri-pūrvān niṣkāt || PS_5,1.30 ||</l>

<l>bistāc ca || PS_5,1.31 ||</l>

<l>viṃśatikāt khaḥ || PS_5,1.32 ||</l>

<l>khāryā īkan || PS_5,1.33 ||</l>

<l>paṇa-pāda-māṣa-śatād yat || PS_5,1.34 ||</l>

<l>śāṇād vā || PS_5,1.35 ||</l>

<l>dvi-tri-pūrvād aṇ ca || PS_5,1.36 ||</l>

<l>tena krītam || PS_5,1.37 ||</l>

<l>tasya nimittaṃ saṃyoga-utpātau || PS_5,1.38 ||</l>

<l>godvyaco 'saṅkhyā-parimāṇa-aśva-ader yat || PS_5,1.39 ||</l>

<l>putrāc cha ca || PS_5,1.40 ||</l>

<l>sarvabhūmi-pṛthivībhyām aṇañau || PS_5,1.41 ||</l>

<l>tasya+īśvaraḥ || PS_5,1.42 ||</l>

<l>tatra vidita iti ca || PS_5,1.43 ||</l>

<l>loka-sarvalokāṭ ṭhañ || PS_5,1.44 ||</l>

<l>tasya vāpaḥ || PS_5,1.45 ||</l>

<l>pātrāt ṣṭhan || PS_5,1.46 ||</l>

<l>tad asmin vṛddhy-āya-lābha-śulka-upadā dīyate || PS_5,1.47 ||</l>

<l>pūraṇa-ardhāṭ ṭhan || PS_5,1.48 ||</l>

<l>bhāgād yac ca || PS_5,1.49 ||</l>

<l>tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.50 ||</l>

<l>vasna-dravyābhyāṃ ṭhan-kanau || PS_5,1.51 ||</l>

<l>sambhavaty avaharati pacati || PS_5,1.52 ||</l>

<l>āḍhaka-ācita-pātrāt kho 'nyatarasyām || PS_5,1.53 ||</l>

<l>dvigoḥ ṣṭhaṃś ca || PS_5,1.54 ||</l>

<l>kulijāl lukkhau ca || PS_5,1.55 ||</l>

<l>so 'sya aṃśa-vasna-bhṛtayaḥ || PS_5,1.56 ||</l>

<l>tad asya parimāṇam || PS_5,1.57 ||</l>

<l>saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñā-saṅgha-sūtra-adhyayaneṣu || PS_5,1.58 ||</l>

<l>paṅkti-viṃśati-triṃśac-catvāriṃśat-pañcāśat-ṣaṣṭi-saptaty-aśīti-navati-śatam || PS_5,1.59 ||</l>

<l>pañcad-daśatau varge vā || PS_5,1.60 ||</l>

<l>saptano 'ñ chandasi || PS_5,1.61 ||</l>

<l>triṃśac-catvāriṃśator brāhmaṇe sañjñāyāṃ ḍaṇ || PS_5,1.62 ||</l>

<l>tad arhati || PS_5,1.63 ||</l>

<l>cheda-ādibhyo nityam || PS_5,1.64 ||</l>

<l>śīrṣacchedād yac ca || PS_5,1.65 ||</l>

<l>daṇdādibhyaḥ || PS_5,1.66 ||</l>

<l>chandasi ca || PS_5,1.67 ||</l>

<l>pātrād ghaṃś ca || PS_5,1.68 ||</l>

<l>kaḍaṅkaradakṣiṇāc cha ca || PS_5,1.69 ||</l>

<l>sthālībilāt || PS_5,1.70 ||</l>

<l>yajña-rtvigbhyāṃ gha-khañau || PS_5,1.71 ||</l>

<l>pārāyaṇa-turāyaṇa-cādnrāyaṇaṃ vartayati || PS_5,1.72 ||</l>

<l>saṃśayamāpannaḥ || PS_5,1.73 ||</l>

<l>yojanaṃ gacchati || PS_5,1.74 ||</l>

<l>pathaḥ ṣkan || PS_5,1.75 ||</l>

<l>pantho ṇa nityam || PS_5,1.76 ||</l>

<l>uttarapathen āhṛtaṃ ca || PS_5,1.77 ||</l>

<l>kālāt || PS_5,1.78 ||</l>

<l>tena virvṛttam || PS_5,1.79 ||</l>

<l>tam adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī || PS_5,1.80 ||</l>

<l>māsād vayasi yatkhañau || PS_5,1.81 ||</l>

<l>dvigor yap || PS_5,1.82 ||</l>

<l>ṣaṇmāsāṇ ṇyac ca || PS_5,1.83 ||</l>

<l>avayasi ṭhaṃś ca || PS_5,1.84 ||</l>

<l>samāyāḥ khaḥ || PS_5,1.85 ||</l>

<l>dvigor vā || PS_5,1.86 ||</l>

<l>rātry-ahaḥ-saṃvatsarāc ca || PS_5,1.87 ||</l>

<l>varṣāl luk ca || PS_5,1.88 ||</l>

<l>cittavati nityam || PS_5,1.89 ||</l>

<l>ṣaṣṭikāḥ ṣaṣṭirātreṇa pacyante || PS_5,1.90 ||</l>

<l>vatsarāntāc chaś chandasi || PS_5,1.91 ||</l>

<l>saṃparipūrvāt kha ca || PS_5,1.92 ||</l>

<l>tena parijayya-labhya-kārya-sukaram || PS_5,1.93 ||</l>

<l>tad asya brahmacaryam || PS_5,1.94 ||</l>

<l>tasya ca dakṣiṇā yajñākhyebhyaḥ || PS_5,1.95 ||</l>

<l>tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat || PS_5,1.96 ||</l>

<l>vyuṣṭa-ādibhyo 'ṇ || PS_5,1.97 ||</l>

<l>tena yathākathāca-hastābhyāṃ ṇa-yatau || PS_5,1.98 ||</l>

<l>sampādini || PS_5,1.99 ||</l>

<l>karma-veṣād yat || PS_5,1.100 ||</l>

<l>tasmai prathavati santāpa-ādibhyāḥ || PS_5,1.101 ||</l>

<l>yogād yac ca || PS_5,1.102 ||</l>

<l>karmaṇa ukañ || PS_5,1.103 ||</l>

<l>samayas tad asya prāptam || PS_5,1.104 ||</l>

<l>ṛtoraṇ || PS_5,1.105 ||</l>

<l>chandasi ghas || PS_5,1.106 ||</l>

<l>kālād yat || PS_5,1.107 ||</l>

<l>prakṛṣṭe ṭhañ || PS_5,1.108 ||</l>

<l>prayojanam || PS_5,1.109 ||</l>

<l>viśākhā-aṣāḍhād aṇ mantha-daṇḍayoḥ || PS_5,1.110 ||</l>

<l>anupravacana-ādibhyaś chaḥ || PS_5,1.111 ||</l>

<l>samāpanāt sapūrvapadāt || PS_5,1.112 ||</l>

<l>aikāgārikaṭ caure || PS_5,1.113 ||</l>

<l>ākālikaḍ-ādyantavacane || PS_5,1.114 ||</l>

<l>tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ || PS_5,1.115 ||</l>

<l>tatra tasya+iva || PS_5,1.116 ||</l>

<l>tad arham || PS_5,1.117 ||</l>

<l>upasargāc chandasi dhātv-arthe || PS_5,1.118 ||</l>

<l>tasya bhāvas tva-talau || PS_5,1.119 ||</l>

<l>ā ca tvāt || PS_5,1.120 ||</l>

<l>na nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣād acatura-saṅgatal-avaṇa-vaṭa-budha-kata-rasa-lasebhyaḥ || PS_5,1.121 ||</l>

<l>pṛthv-ādibhya imanij vā || PS_5,1.122 ||</l>

<l>varṇa-dṛḍha-ādibhyaḥ ṣyañ ca || PS_5,1.123 ||</l>

<l>guṇavacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca || PS_5,1.124 ||</l>

<l>stonād yan nalopaś ca || PS_5,1.125 ||</l>

<l>sakhyur yaḥ || PS_5,1.126 ||</l>

<l>kapi-jñātyor ḍhak || PS_5,1.127 ||</l>

<l>patyantapurohitādibhyo yak || PS_5,1.128 ||</l>

<l>prāṇabhṛjjāti-vayovacana-udgātrādibhyo 'ñ || PS_5,1.129 ||</l>

<l>hāyanānta-yuvādibhyo 'ṇ || PS_5,1.130 ||</l>

<l>ig-antāś ca laghu-pūrvāt || PS_5,1.131 ||</l>

<l>ya-upadhād guru-upottamād vuñ || PS_5,1.132 ||</l>

<l>dvandva-manojña-ādibhyaś ca || PS_5,1.133 ||</l>

<l>gotracaraṇāc chlāghā-atyākāra-tadaveteṣu || PS_5,1.134 ||</l>

<l>hotrābhyaś chaḥ || PS_5,1.135 ||</l>

<l>brahmaṇas tvaḥ || PS_5,1.136 ||</l>

<l>dhānyānāṃ bhavane kṣetre khañ || PS_5,2.1 ||</l>

<l>vrīhi-śālyor ḍhak || PS_5,2.2 ||</l>

<l>yava-yavaka-ṣaṣṭikād yat || PS_5,2.3 ||</l>

<l>vibhāṣā tila-māṣa-umā-bhaṅgā-aṇubhyaḥ || PS_5,2.4 ||</l>

<l>sarvacarmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ kha-khañau || PS_5,2.5 ||</l>

<l>yathāmukha-sammukhasya darśanaḥ khaḥ || PS_5,2.6 ||</l>

<l>tat sarva-ādeḥ pathy-aṅga-karma-patra-pātraṃ vyāpnoti || PS_5,2.7 ||</l>

<l>āprapadaṃ prāpnoti || PS_5,2.8 ||</l>

<l>anupada-sarvānna-aya-anayaṃ baddhā-bhakṣayati-neyeṣu || PS_5,2.9 ||</l>

<l>parovara-parampara-putrapautram anubhavati || PS_5,2.10 ||</l>

<l>avārapāra-atyanta-anukāmaṃ gāmī || PS_5,2.11 ||</l>

<l>samāṃsamāṃ vijāyate || PS_5,2.12 ||</l>

<l>adyaśvīnā avaṣṭabdhe || PS_5,2.13 ||</l>

<l>āgavīnaḥ || PS_5,2.14 ||</l>

<l>anugv-alaṅgāmī || PS_5,2.15 ||</l>

<l>adhvano yat-khau || PS_5,2.16 ||</l>

<l>abhyamitrāc cha ca || PS_5,2.17 ||</l>

<l>goṣṭhāt khañ bhūtapūrve || PS_5,2.18 ||</l>

<l>aśvasyaikāhagamaḥ || PS_5,2.19 ||</l>

<l>śālīna-kaupīne adhṛṣṭa-akāryayoḥ || PS_5,2.20 ||</l>

<l>vrātena jīvati || PS_5,2.21 ||</l>

<l>sāptapadīnaṃ sakhyam || PS_5,2.22 ||</l>

<l>haiyaṅgavīnaṃ sañjñāyām || PS_5,2.23 ||</l>

<l>tasya pāka-mūle pīlvadi-karṇādibhyaḥ kuṇab-jāhacau || PS_5,2.24 ||</l>

<l>pakṣāt tiḥ || PS_5,2.25 ||</l>

<l>tena vittaś cuñcup-caṇapau || PS_5,2.26 ||</l>

<l>vi-nañbhyāṃ nā-nāñau nasaha || PS_5,2.27 ||</l>

<l>veḥ śālac-chaṅkaṭacau || PS_5,2.28 ||</l>

<l>saṃ-pra-udaś ca kaṭac || PS_5,2.29 ||</l>

<l>avāt kuṭārac ca || PS_5,2.30 ||</l>

<l>nate nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ ṭīṭañ-nāṭaj-bhraṭacaḥ || PS_5,2.31 ||</l>

<l>nerbiḍajbirīsacau || PS_5,2.32 ||</l>

<l>inac piṭac cika ci ca || PS_5,2.33 ||</l>

<l>upa-adhibhyāṃ tyakann āsanna-ārūḍhayoḥ || PS_5,2.34 ||</l>

<l>karmaṇi ghaṭo 'ṭhac || PS_5,2.35 ||</l>

<l>tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac || PS_5,2.36 ||</l>

<l>pramāṇe dvayasaj-daghnañ-mātracaḥ || PS_5,2.37 ||</l>

<l>puruṣa-hastibhyām aṇ ca || PS_5,2.38 ||</l>

<l>yat-tad-etebhyaḥ parimāṇe vatup || PS_5,2.39 ||</l>

<l>kim-idam-bhyāṃ vo ghaḥ || PS_5,2.40 ||</l>

<l>kimaḥ saṅkhyāparimāṇe ḍati ca || PS_5,2.41 ||</l>

<l>saṅkhyāyā avayave tayap || PS_5,2.42 ||</l>

<l>dvi-tribhyāṃ tayasya ayaj vā || PS_5,2.43 ||</l>

<l>ubhād udātto nityam || PS_5,2.44 ||</l>

<l>tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ || PS_5,2.45 ||</l>

<l>śadanta-viṃśateś ca || PS_5,2.46 ||</l>

<l>saṅkhyāyā guṇasya nimāne mayaṭ || PS_5,2.47 ||</l>

<l>tasya pūraṇe ḍaṭ || PS_5,2.48 ||</l>

<l>na antād asaṅkhyā-āder maṭ || PS_5,2.49 ||</l>

<l>vāhanam āhitāt || PS_8,4.8 ||</l>

<l>pānaṃ deśe || PS_8,4.9 ||</l>

<l>vā bhāva-karaṇayoḥ || PS_8,4.10 ||</l>

<l>prātipadikānta-num-vibhaktiṣu ca || PS_8,4.11 ||</l>

<l>ekājuttarapade ṇaḥ || PS_8,4.12 ||</l>

<l>kumati ca || PS_8,4.13 ||</l>

<l>upasargād asamāse 'pi ṇa-upadeśasya || PS_8,4.14 ||</l>

<l>hinu-mīnā || PS_8,4.15 ||</l>

<l>āni loṭ || PS_8,4.16 ||</l>

<l>ner gada-nada-pata-pada-ghu-mā-syati-hanti-yāti-vāti-drāti-psāti-vapati-vahati-śāmyati-cinoti-degdhiṣu ca || PS_8,4.17 ||</l>

<l>śeṣe vibhāṣā 'ka-khādāv-aṣānta upadeśe || PS_8,4.18 ||</l>

<l>aniteḥ || PS_8,4.19 ||</l>

<l>antaḥ || PS_8,4.20 ||</l>

<l>ubhau sābhyāsasya || PS_8,4.21 ||</l>

<l>hanter atpūrvasya || PS_8,4.22 ||</l>

<l>va-mor vā || PS_8,4.23 ||</l>

<l>antar adeśe || PS_8,4.24 ||</l>

<l>ayanaṃ ca || PS_8,4.25 ||</l>

<l>chandasy ṛdavagrahāt || PS_8,4.26 ||</l>

<l>naś ca dhātustha-uru-ṣubhyaḥ || PS_8,4.27 ||</l>

<l>upasargād bahulam || PS_8,4.28 ||</l>

<l>kṛty acaḥ || PS_8,4.29 ||</l>

<l>ṇer vibhāṣā || PS_8,4.30 ||</l>

<l>halaścejupadhāt || PS_8,4.31 ||</l>

<l>ijādeḥ sanumaḥ || PS_8,4.32 ||</l>

<l>vā niṃsa-nikṣa-nindām || PS_8,4.33 ||</l>

<l>na bhā-bhū-pū-kami-gami-pyāyī-vepām || PS_8,4.34 ||</l>

<l>ṣāt padāntāt || PS_8,4.35 ||</l>

<l>naśeḥ ṣāntasya || PS_8,4.36 ||</l>

<l>padāntasya || PS_8,4.37 ||</l>

<l>padavyavāye 'pi || PS_8,4.38 ||</l>

<l>kṣubhnādiṣu ca || PS_8,4.39 ||</l>

<l>s-toḥ ś-cunā ś-cuḥ || PS_8,4.40 ||</l>

<l>ṣṭunā ṣuḥ || PS_8,4.41 ||</l>

<l>na padāntāṭ ṭor anām || PS_8,4.42 ||</l>

<l>toḥ ṣi || PS_8,4.43 ||</l>

<l>śāt || PS_8,4.44 ||</l>

<l>yaro 'nunāsike 'nunāsiko vā || PS_8,4.45 ||</l>

<l>aco ra-hābhyāṃ dve || PS_8,4.46 ||</l>

<l>anaci ca || PS_8,4.47 ||</l>

<l>na ādiny-ākrośe putrasya || PS_8,4.48 ||</l>

<l>śaro 'ci || PS_8,4.49 ||</l>

<l>triprabhṛtiṣu śākaṭāyanasya || PS_8,4.50 ||</l>

<l>sarvatra śākalyasya || PS_8,4.51 ||</l>

<l>dīrghād ācāryāṇām || PS_8,4.52 ||</l>

<l>jhalaṃ jaś jhaśi || PS_8,4.53 ||</l>

<l>abhyāse carca || PS_8,4.54 ||</l>

<l>khari ca || PS_8,4.55 ||</l>

<l>vā+avasāne || PS_8,4.56 ||</l>

<l>aṇo 'pragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ || PS_8,4.57 ||</l>

<l>anusvārasya yayi parasavarṇaḥ || PS_8,4.58 ||</l>

<l>vā padāntasya || PS_8,4.59 ||</l>

<l>tor li || PS_8,4.60 ||</l>

<l>udaḥ sthāstambhoḥ pūrvasya || PS_8,4.61 ||</l>

<l>jhayo ho 'nyatarasyām || PS_8,4.62 ||</l>

<l>śaścho 'ṭi || PS_8,4.63 ||</l>

<l>halo yamāṃ yami lopaḥ || PS_8,4.64 ||</l>

<l>jharo jhari savarṇe || PS_8,4.65 ||</l>

<l>udattād anudāttasya svaritaḥ || PS_8,4.66 ||</l>

<l>na+udāttasvaritodayam a-gārghya-kāśyapa-gālavānām || PS_8,4.67 ||</l>

<l>a a iti || PS_8,4.68 ||</l>

  </body>
